attributes.action: Give Knighthood's to Harry Patch and Henry Allingham
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Government should consider both Harry Patch and Henry Allingham for a Knighthood, because,
Both these men fought in the first World War, which was termed "Hell on Earth". Not only that, they are the ONLY combatants still alive. When these men sadly pass away, WW1 will change from "Living History" to History. Surely these men deserve a Knighthood for what they have been through for OUR Country.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.direct.gov.uk/honours
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
